lead_paragraph: The State Department released this document, along with thousands of other pages of email correspondence, from former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton’s private email server. They are looking into how she electronically handled government information.

headline.main: Clinton Email Released by State Department, With Secret Information Redacted

snippet: The State Department released this document, along with thousands of other pages of email correspondence, from former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton’s private email server. They are looking into how she electronically handled government information.
